#summary What software is used in this project

== Internal Tools ==

 * Trig Table Generator, used for generating trig function result tables to be stored in flash memory.
 * Settings Generator, used to generate declarations for all setting variables using a CSV file, and to generate a function to restore their default values.

== Other External Tools ==

 * [http://www.solidworks.com/ Solidworks 2009] is used for the frame design
 * [http://cadsoft.de/ Cadsoft Eagle 5.7] is used for the circuit design
 * [http://www.microsoft.com/express/Downloads/#2008-Visual-CS Visual C# Express 2008] is used for some of the utilites
 * The flight controller firmware is written with [http://code.google.com/p/avr-project-ide/ AVR Project IDE]
 * Some documentation are written with [http://www.openoffice.org/ OpenOffice.org]
